title: Mystery champion and some question
body:
Okay, so just now i opened my league of legends. Then after i log in to my account, something popped out. It says something like "The message can't be prose....". Yeahh so i restart the app twice and the 3rd time it doesnt pop out.
Is it the mystery champion thinggy ?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you elaborate further on the error you're experiencing? "This message can't be prose" doesn't help us diagnose your problem.

Here are some general fixes you can try:
* [Repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)
* [Force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5)
* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
